```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(USAboundaries)
library(mappingelections)

map_id <- "meae.congressional.congress16.ri.county"
```

<div class="map">

```{r election-map, echo = FALSE}
map_id %>%
  get_county_map_data() %>%
  map_counties(height = "500px", congress = 16)
```

</div>

Rhode Island elected two Democratic-Republicans to the Sixteenth Congress.

Rhode Island used a statewide at-large system for electing a member to Congress.

<div class="results-table">

```{r election-results, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
map_id %>%
  candidate_results() %>%
  results_to_table() %>%
  cat()
```

</div>
